# st-cdnetworks_ssl_certificate (Resource)

The resource control the IPv6 protocol for domain

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "st-cdnetworks_ipv6_config" "test" {
  domain_id = "5048000"
  enable_ipv6 = true
}
```

## Schema

### Required

- `domain_id` (String) Domain ID
- `enable_ipv6` (Boolean) Enable IPv6.
